description: Swedish climate activist Greta Thunberg was defiant outside British court as she defended her actions protesting an oil and gas industry conference last year in London.

title: President Biden to name John Podesta as top US climate diplomat to replace John Kerry
description: John Podesta, now a senior adviser on clean energy and a veteran Democratic strategist, will take on a new title as senior adviser to the president for international climate policy.

title: Piers Morgan rips climate protesters hurling soup at Mona Lisa: 'Complete and utter imbeciles'
description: Fox Nation host Piers Morgan joined 'Fox & Friends' to discuss his reaction to climate protesters defacing the Mona Lisa.

title: Activists throw soup at Mona Lisa in Louvre climate protest
description: Two climate activists hurled what museum employees called pumpkin soup at the protective glass around the Mona Lisa at the Louvre museum Sunday.

title: Biden's halting of liquified natural gas projects  is 'utter nonsense': Marc Morano
description: Climatedepot.com Executive Director Marc Morano discusses the impact on American energy from the Biden administration's halt of liquified natural gas projects and reacts to Davos saying that drinking coffee causes climate change.

title: UN appeals for $7.9 billion to help millions of migrants flee climate change, conflict
description: The United Nations has called on governments and the private sector to help raise $7.9 billion to migrate people around the world and come up with solutions to stop displacement.

title: World Economic Forum elites blasted for talking about climate dangers posed by coffee: 'Hands off'
description: Social media users slammed panelists at the World Economic Forum's Annual Meeting for talking about the impact of coffee production's impact on climate.

title: I had a job on the Keystone XL pipeline until Biden fired me to satisfy climate extremists
description: Climate extremists didn't like the Keystone XL pipeline. So Biden canceled the project and cost 11,000 of us our jobs. Three years later, that decision is still harming our nation.

title: Reporter who confronted John Kerry over carbon footprint says he wouldn't answer 'the most basic question'
description: Reporter Avi Yemini called out climate czar John Kerry for being "out of touch" after a tense confrontation between the pair in Switzerland over his own carbon footprint.

title: Reporter who confronted John Kerry on carbon footprint rips 'out of touch' leaders
description: Avi Yemini, chief reporter for Rebel News, joins 'Fox & Friends First' to discuss the 'huge' carbon footprint of the Davos event each year and the hypocrisy of attendees who refuse to answer 'basic questions' on sustainability.

title: Irish climate minister greets Chinese premier who arrived on record-size plane at Dublin Airport
description: Irish Minister for Transport, Climate, Environment and Communications Eamon Ryan greeted Chinese Premier Li Qiang, who arrived on the largest passenger aircraft ever to land at Dublin Airport.

title: John Kerry praises Biden for preventing 'uncontrolled war in many regions'
description: John Kerry told reporters on Wednesday that President Biden has prevented us from a "complete breakout of uncontrolled war in many regions," at the World Economic Forum in Davos.

title: Radical climate activist endorses blowing up pipelines in startling interview, admits people could be killed
description: Andreas Malm, author of "How to Blow Up a Pipeline," explained that escalating climate activism could someday lead to inevitable accidents and deaths.

title: Climate groups urge Speaker Johnson to fight back on Biden’s ‘Green New Deal agenda’
description: Climate change experts from conservative climate and energy groups are calling on Speaker Mike Johnson to crack down on President Biden's climate policies.

title: World Economic Forum to kick off in Davos, Switzerland with global elites likely to face flak for private jets
description: At last year's World Economic Forum, business leaders and government officials were slammed for using private jets while discussing the climate crisis.

title: DeSantis slams Kerry, Obama, Biden on climate change during debate: 'Guys talk out of one side of their mouth'
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis slammed Presidents Obama and Biden along with climate czar John Kerry arguing their climate change warnings don't match up with their lifestyles.

title: Climate change threatens river basins worldwide as snowpack declines, study finds
description: A new study has found that river basins worldwide, which were once covered in snow, are experiencing declining snowpack due to the impact of climate change.

title: Green energy was 2023's biggest loser. Will Biden and progressives wake up in 2024?
description: President Biden told Americans in 2023 that it would be a year that would usher in a 'transition' to renewable energy. Boy, was he wrong. Green energy was a big, fat loser in 2023.

title: Expert shares the year’s worst climate hypocrites, from King Charles to John Kerry
description: ‘Climate Depot’ publisher Marc Morano ranks the worst climate hypocrites of 2023 on ‘Fox & Friends Weekend.’

title: New Year's Eve beverage could go extinct due to climate change, AI company predicts
description: ClimateAI VP of Operations and Strategy Will Kletter says AI-driven data is forecasting that a changing climate could shape the future of champagne and wine.

title: Pacific Northwest sees increased popularity in 'assisted migration' as tree species face decline
description: The Pacific Northwest is facing challenges as native trees are affected by climate change. In response, the U.S. Forest Service is exploring "assisted migration" to help.

title: Randi Weingarten, Greta Thunberg and the other 5 most-annoying people in the world
description: It’s been a year of special people – needy celebrities, a new king, dishonest and senile politicians (at the same time), and famous people who clutter up our social media feeds.

title: Biggest natural disasters of 2023: Earthquakes, snowstorms, fires and more
description: Floods, earthquakes, and deadly wildfires raged around the world in 2023. Here is a retrospective look at some of the deadliest disasters in the U.S. and across the world.

title: At least 100 elephants die in one of Africa's largest national parks due to drought
description: Drought has led to the death of at least 100 elephants in Zimbabwe's Hwange National Park. Authorities warn of a potential crisis as forecasts predict further scarcity of rain.

title: 'COMMAND AND CONTROL': Nations at COP28 agree to transition from fossil fuels
description: Climate Depot executive editor Marc Morano calls the United Nations' climate push 'absolute virtue-signaling' on 'The Ingraham Angle.'

title: Trump blasts Kerry's climate activism for 'destroying our country' in Iowa town hall: 'He has to be stopped'
description: Former President Donald Trump told a town hall on Tuesday that John Kerry's climate policies "has to be stopped" and that he is "destroying the country."

title: Nelson Mandela's granddaughter demands reparations from royal family for suffering under colonization
description: Ndileka Mandela, granddaughter of former South African President Nelson Mandela, is demanding reparations from the British government for years of colonization.

title: COP28 climate conference is not just the Super Bowl of virtue signaling. It's doing real damage
description: The United Nations COP28 climate talks are underway in Abu Dhabi and once again the Biden White House is agreeing to unrealistic climate goals that threaten Americans.

title: 'Climate change is also a religious problem': Pope Francis says religious leaders responsible for planet
description: During the COP-28 summit in Dubai, Pope Francis stressed the importance of climate change being religious leaders responsibility.

title: King Charles: Pay $5 trillion annually to prevent climate catastrophe
description: King Charles III has called for $5 trillion to be spend every year on climate change prevention and initiatives.

title: US commits to shutting down its coal plants during COP28
description: The United States has committed to building no new coal plants and phasing out existing plants as part of its plan to tackle climate change

title: Newt Gingrich roasts John Kerry's climate conference trip: 'Deeply committed to taking your money'
description: Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich reacts to John Kerry's trip to the COP28 climate conference in Dubai, calling it a "ripoff" of workers across the world.

title: DeSantis confronts Newsom on energy: 'Government dictated green energy policies'
description: Gov. Ron DeSantis, R-Fla., and Gov. Gavin Newsom, D-Calif., debate on energy policies in each of their states on 'Hannity.'

title: Newt Gingrich: How could they have been so stupid for so long
description: Former Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich reacts to the latest climate push as the annual United Nations COP28 kicks off on 'The Ingraham Angle.'

title: GOP senator roasts John Kerry for jetting off to another climate conference
description: A Republican senator is roasting President Biden's climate czar John Kerry for jetting off to another U.N. conference where he is expected to again advocate for green energy.

title: Ramaswamy swipes 'GOP establishment' in Iowa for supporting CO2 pipelines as part of climate ‘hoax’
description: GOP hopeful Vivek Ramaswamy is speaking out against the CO2 pipeline he says negatively impacts Iowa farmers, taking a swipe at Iowa Gov. Kim Reynolds for supporting it.

title: Texas oyster harvests plunge again as climate change and overharvesting threaten industry, officials say
description: Texas has closed the majority of its public oyster reefs for the second consecutive year due to declining populations caused by climate change and overharvesting.

title: Pope Francis reveals lung inflammation ahead of Dubai climate conference trip
description: Pope Francis is set to be heading to Dubai for a climate conference this week, despite suffering from lung inflammation. The pontiff received a CT scan Saturday.

title: World's biggest iceberg starts moving for first time in decades — and it could cause some serious problems
description: The world’s largest iceberg, which has moved for the first time in 30 years, could drift toward South Georgia Island and end up caught in a vital pass that animals use to access food during breeding season to feed their newborns.

title: UN Secretary-General visits Antarctica as climate talks loom
description: United Nations Secretary-General António Guterres arrived in Antarctica on Thursday ahead of international climate talks at the COP28 conference

title: Climate activist disrupts ritzy EU conference with messy green goo vomit demonstration
description: Climate activists disrupted a European Union conference on green energy, with one demonstrator taking to throwing up green goo near the stage in Brussels, Belgium.

title: Biden climate envoy Kerry to unveil 1st-ever global plan to commercialize nuclear fusion energy at UN summit
description: U.S. Special Presidential Envoy for Climate John Kerry will announce a "vision for international partnerships for an inclusive fusion energy future" at COP28 in Dubai.

title: European country wants to charge 'green tax' on all flights to fund pensions: report
description: A new Danish "green tax" proposal would charge airline passengers a fee based on how long their flight is, with the money going toward a transition to sustainable fuels.

title: Texas Education Board divided on how to address climate change in science textbooks
description: The Texas State Board of Education is set to vote on the approval of science textbooks and how they address climate change. The vote outcome will impact which books are used.

title: Droughts are causing die-offs of iconic red cedar in Pacific Northwest, scientists say
description: Red cedar trees in the Pacific Northwest, known as climate canaries, are facing die-offs due to climate change-induced drought, forest health specialists say.

title: Bill Gates buying up land, threatening small farms under guise of saving planet, author claims
description: Seamus Bruner's new book, "Controligarchs," claims wealthy activists like Bill Gates are monopolizing America's food supply under the guise of saving the planet.

title: Climate change hits beer industry, prompting farmers and researchers to adapt
description: Climate change is making an impact on the beer industry, as hops and barley growers in the U.S. experience challenges such as extreme heat and drought.

title: Greta Thunberg interrupted at climate protest after changing the topic to the Israel-Hamas war
description: Greta Thunberg allowed an Palestinian and Afghan woman to speak during a climate change protest in Amsterdam on Nov. 12, 2023, when a man interrupted the young activist.

title: Jill Stein announces 2024 Green Party bid for president
description: Jill Stein has announced a Green Party bid for the 2024 presidential election. Stein vowed to end the two-party rule, address climate change and advance a Green New Deal.

title: American lawyer arrested for fatally shooting two environmental protesters at Panama road blockade: police
description: A retired American lawyer allegedly fatally shot two protesters in Panama on Tuesday after becoming enraged about a demonstration that had blocked a busy highway.

title: German police officer accused of painting climate activist's face with orange paint after slamming to ground
description: Climate activists from the Letzte Generation defaced the Federal Chancellery in Berlin, Germany, with orange paint as police officers made 70 arrests.

title: Fossil fuel interests have large, yet often murky, presence at climate talks, AP analysis finds
description: At last year's UN climate talks in Egypt, 400 individuals related to the fossil fuel industry were present, according to AP investigation.

title: Wash Post advice column from psychiatrist promotes psychedelics for solving 'eco-anxiety', 'climate grief'
description: A psychiatrist argued that psychedelics coupled with psychotherapy may offer the solution for patient suffering from anxiety about a climate catastrophe.

title: California's Newsom has surprise meeting in Beijing with China's Xi , gets torched for climate 'fearmongering'
description: Democratic California Gov. Gavin Newsom said his surprise meeting with Chinese leader Xi Jinping in Beijing focused on combatting climate change, fentanyl.

title: Sen Risch to introduce bill giving states power to stop 'unwanted' climate change projects on public land
description: Sen. Jim Risch (R-Idaho) is introducing the Don't DO IT Act, opposing climate initiatives on public land if rejected by state legislatures.

title: The latest attempt to take away your gas-powered car
description: Another government agency has proposed a rule with lofty ambitions of increasing standards in passenger cars.

title: Kirby confronted on recent Biden claim climate change 'the only existential threat' as Hamas bombs Israel
description: After President Biden warned against climate change during his Vietnam visit, NSC spokesman John Kirby was questioned about the remark following Hamas' attacks on Israel.

title: Climate scientist claims he might be fired for refusing to return from research trip by plane
description: A climate researcher alleged that his employer is preparing to fire him for refusing to travel back to Germany from a research trip on a jet airliner.

title: The big mistake in Pope Francis's new climate change scolding
description: There is an essential problem at the heart of Pope Francis's recent Apostolic Exhortation, Laudate Deum.
